title: Isolating $$t$$
text: The first step in solving for $$t$$ is to divide both sides by the coefficient of the e term.

title: Dividing by Coefficient
text: What is the value of the left hand side when dividing both sides of the equation by 20?

title: Variable in Exponent
text: To get the variable out of the exponent, take the ln of both sides.

title: Inverse Functions
text: Since ln(x) and $$e^x$$ are inverse functions, taking the natural log of a term with e leaves only the exponent.

title: Isolate $$t$$
text: To isolate $$t$$ by itself, divide both sides by the coefficient of $$t$$.
